good_news_message: GOOD NEWS, WE HAVE RECEIVED YOUR ONLINE ORDER
thank_you_order_message: Thank you for ordering online and encouraging Quebec businesses, you make our day! Your support and confidence in us is greatly appreciated. Your order will be shipped within 3 to 5 days.
have_you_heard_about_our_message: Have you heard about our unlimited in-salon beauty care subscription?
with_membership_message: With membership, you will have the opportunity to choose any of our services offered as many times as you wish each month! For only $90 a month, you will have unlimited care services whether it’s hair treatments or aesthetic treatments, we have everything you need!
treat_your_self: Treat yourself month to month with proper care. Find out more at: www.soinskarisma.com
contact_us_directly: Contact us directly on our website or by email at support@soinskarisma.com or on social media, Instagram (Soins.Karisma) and Facebook (Soins Karismä)
thank_you_for_choosing: Thanks again for choosing us. I will make sure that our team offers you a service beyond your expectations.
if_you_have_any_questions_please_contact: If you have any questions, please contact us
all_rights_reserved: © 2022 Soins Karismä Inc. All rights reserved
soins_address: 249 Rue St-Jacques Ouest, #201 Montréal, Québec H2Y 1M6
